import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { login } from '../services/api'; const Login = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogin = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await login(email, password); localStorage.setItem('token', response.token); localStorage.setItem('isMerchant', response.is_merchant); navigate('/dashboard'); } catch (err) { setError(err.response?.data?.error || 'Login failed'); } }; return (

Welcome Back

Sign in to your account to continue

{error && (

{error}

)}
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />

Don't have an account?{' '} Contact support

); }; export default Login;
